short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes spacebar actually pause youtube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As long as when pressing space on youtube will not pause the video, our life mission is incomplete. So we introduce you the next cutting edge technology into your personal youtube - a youtube that actually pauses on spacebar (!!!!!!!!) (BTW: We are open minded about being acquired by google.)
